flawed_nl_solution:
Tommy has a total of 20 x 3 = <<20*3=60>>60 kilograms of tomatoes.
Only 60 - 3 = <<60-3=57>>57 kilograms can be sold.
His earnings for the tomatoes will be $57*6=432.
Thus, his profit will be $432 - $330 = $<<432-330=102>>102.
#### 102

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 342, not 432. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
